name: Ciri Trainer
description:
Help Ciri to become a witcher by mastering the art of fighting and the wonders of alchemy and magic
Restore Kaer Morhen to its former glory by implementing its defenses or building new areas
Experience the lore of The Witcher in this Visual Novel/Trainer mixing different genres and featuring Original Characters from both the game and the books
Choose how to treat Ciri and face the consequences of your actions in multiple endings:
Will she become the most feared of witchers or the sluttiest of whores?
Choice is yours: are you ready to shape her fate?​
